title: PARENTAL LEAVE: EQUAL RIGHTS TO MUMS AND DADS SAY GREENS (Scottish Green Party)
text: ( Source : Scottish Green Party ) Sunday, October 11th , 2015 The Scottish Greens have today voted to support equal rights for mothers and fathers in the provision of parental leave. The vote was taken at the party's annual conference at the
